title: Ladybird passes the Apple 90% threshold on web-platform-tests
author: sergiotapia
aiHeadline: Ladybird finally climbs the ladder of web-platform-tests and now boasts a 90% approval rating, just like Apple's latest iPhone features.

title: Why do LLMs freak out over the seahorse emoji?
author: nyxt
aiHeadline: LLMs are throwing a tantrum over the seahorse emoji, proving once again that even the smartest machines can't handle the ocean's mysteries.

title: 1 Trillion Web Pages Archived
author: pabs3
aiHeadline: The internetarchive just hit a trillion archived web pages, which is impressive unless you're the guy who runs out of storage on their phone.

title: Gem.coop
author: mbStavola
aiHeadline: Gem.coop is the latest attempt to create a utopian online community, and by 'utopian,' we mean 'probably going to fail spectacularly.'

title: Structured Procrastination (1995)
author: ipnon
aiHeadline: Structured Procrastination turns 28, proving that some habits are timeless, and by 'habits,' we mean 'avoiding work at all costs.'
